page.title: 12INDUSTRY - GENERAL.
page.content: { Ascot Drive Industrial Estate}has a wide diversity of manufacturing and wholesale factory units.The range of products ranges from{hand built racing {bicycles,}to the manufacture of{roof and{sun houses}using {polyester resin. A large{scrap metal}yard takes in old motor vehicles,sells useful components as{second hand parts}and sends the rest away for{re-smelting.}Various building supply hypermarkets sell articles from the{smallest washer}to {complete bathrooms. { British Rail Workshops}repair and build{engines}and{rolling stock.}They also dismantle{obsolete wagons}etc. They have their own technical centre for{research and development,}which includes the 125mph{Advanced Passenger {train. British Celanese}produce a range of synthetic materials for making{clothing}and{upholstery.
